function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective health and safety management in residential apartment buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission and disease spread within the buildings","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust health and safety protocols, regular cleaning and disinfection, and clear guidelines for residents","Technologies":"Smart building management systems, air purification systems, and touchless technologies","People":"Residents, building owners, property managers","Owner":"Building owners, property management companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate urban design for open public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission in public spaces and gatherings","Mitigation":"High-quality urban design that facilitates non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs), behavior guidelines for public spaces, and maintenance of adequate distancing measures","Technologies":"Smart urban planning tools, crowd monitoring technologies, and public space management systems","People":"City residents, visitors, urban planners","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, city government"},{"Description":"Insufficient governance and stakeholder engagement in pandemic-focused urban planning","Impact":"Lack of preparedness and coordination for pandemic response at the city level","Mitigation":"Ethically-informed governance frameworks, public deliberation, and stakeholder engagement in urban planning and pandemic preparedness","Technologies":"Platform for public engagement, data-driven decision-making tools, and governance management systems","People":"City leaders, local government, public health officials","Owner":"City governance authorities, public health agencies"}]}
